mapper.insert: insert into admin_board values(seq_admin_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, default, default, default, default, #{writer})
mapper.select: select count(*) from admin_board where admin_board_status = 'Y'

select board_no, title, content, a.create_date, a.update_date, views, admin_board_status, writer, member_nickname from admin_board a join member m on(writer=member_no) where admin_board_status = 'Y' order by create_date desc
select board_no, title, content from admin_board where admin_board_status = 'Y' and board_no = #{id}
